original_text: From there it went to the springs of Nephtoah and onto the cities near Mount Ephron. It went towards Baalah (also called Kiriath-Jearim).
korean_text: 또 이 산 꼭대기에서부터 넵도아 샘물까지 이르러 에브론 산 성읍들로 나아가고 또 바알라 곧 기럇 여아림으로 접어들며

sentences.original_text: From there it went to the springs of Nephtoah
and onto the cities near Mount Ephron
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 에브론 산 근처의 도시들로 갔습니다
